name: Massimo Amfiteatrof
description: '''Maksim Aleksandrovič Amfiteatrov''' ({{Langx|ru|Максим Александрович Амфитеатров|link=no}}; 27 February 1907 – 19 December 1990), known as '''Massimo Amfiteatrof''', was an Italian [[cellist]] of Russian descent, dubbed as the "Cellists' [[Enrico Caruso|Caruso]]" ({{Langx|it|il Caruso dei Violoncellisti|link=no}}).
